title: Antibody Reengineering Improves Therapeutic Index in Preclinical Models
items.abstract:
<jats:title>Abstract</jats:title>
               <jats:p>An EGFR Probody exhibits antitumor efficacy similar to cetuximab, with decreased skin toxicity.</jats:p>
